sentences.english: The  costly post was  postponed because of the  frost.
sentences.chinese: 那件昂貴的郵件由於霜的緣故而延擱。

sentences.english: The police were delayed by the absence of information about the crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方因未掌握犯罪情報而延擱了行動。

sentences.english: They were held up by the immigration authorities.
Food can also be held up on the seas or at the dockside .
sentences.chinese: 糧食也可能延擱在海上或碼頭上。
